item.title: Helen add a quote by Seanan McGuire
item.description:
"October—
You were sleeping so peacefully that I was loath to wake you. Duke Torquill, after demanding to know what I was doing in your apartment, has requested that I inform you of his intent to visit after ‘tending to some business at the Queen’s Court.’ I recommend wearing something clinging, as that may distract him from whatever he wishes to lecture you about this time. Hopefully, it’s your manners.
You are truly endearing when you sleep. I attribute this to the exotic nature of seeing you in a state of silence.
—Tybalt " -- Seanan McGuire

item.title: Helen add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "My mother once told me that no woman is naked when she comes equipped with a bad mood and a steady glare." -- Mira Grant

item.title: Helen add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "Now I'm a God, but tomorrow, when you have to stop me from playing with dead things again, you'll be right back to calling me an idiot, won't you?" -- Mira Grant

item.title: Helen add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "It's the oldest story in the world. Boy loves girl. Boy loses girl. Boy gets girl back thanks to the unethical behavior of megalomaniacal mad scientists who never met a corpse they wouldn't try to resurrect. Anyone coming within a hundred yards of my happy ending had better pray that they're immune to bullets. - Shaun Mason" -- Mira Grant

item.title: Helen add a quote by Mira Grant
item.description: "I suggest it’s time we head off to see the Wizard. The wonderful Wizard of Jesus We Are All So Fucked." -- Mira Grant
